result.name: climatology-raster-data-for-the-newton-coastal-management-in-the-philippines-2002-2018
result.notes:
Climatologies computed as input data for QGIS plugin- Spatial Planning Tool as 
.tif file. This data is supplied on two scales Bantayan islands- 1km grid and 
Doong island 100m grid. This is supplied to users in case they wish to 
classify and standardise the input climatologies in different way from the one 
used in the project: Marine spatial planning of aquaculture facilities in the 
Philippines.
